Recent QSO

  • Apr 18, 2016

    Made New Antenna

50 Feet

Jan 17, 2016

  1. Plant 1 1/4” EMT 9’ into the ground
  2. Sleave 1 1/2” EMT over it and plant 1’ into ground
  3. Plant copper ground rod 8’ into the ground
  4. Attach UBolts and plate
  • KM4FPA - Kevin's Amateur Radio Station
  • kevin@km4fpa.com

I am KM4FPA, Kevin from Auburndale, a ham radio station in Central Florida. I am an EagleNet and SKYWARN NCS, proud member of the ARRL, and antenna junkie.
